Key Match Events: GOAL! Mabululu converts from penalty spot
GOAL! Bounedjah gives Algeria deserved lead
Algeria 1-1 Angola - Angola hold on for a point!
Pre-Game Insights: Algeria finished bottom of their group in crashing out after a disastrous AFCON showing two years ago
It is 12 years since Angola last won an AFCON match, but come into this match on the back of four consecutive goalless draws
Post-Match Reflections: More frustration at AFCON for Algeria, following on from their results two years ago
Angola had to come from behind to get a result, really impressive from them. They'll be believing they can reach the knockout stages.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mahrez actually lays it off, before Cipriano is forced into a big save. Then a bit of a scramble, turned behind for a corner.
Free-kick on the edge of the area. Step up, Mahrez....
Algeria looking a bit desperate - and they've looked really tired in the last 20 minutes or so.
